definition.para: Full text contained in the resource.

instructions.para: Enter the text as it appears in the resource.

customization.para: Enter the text as it appears in the resource.
Enter a textual transcription of all or some of the contents in the resource.

example.para: At a meeting of the officers and employes [sic] of the Coast Survey Office, held on the 12st inst, to give expression to their sense of the loss sustained by the death of Brig. Gen. I.I. Stevens, U.S. Volunteers, who had long filled an important position in the work, the following address prepared by Prof. Bache, who is absent from the City, was read, and the subjoined resolution passed.

customization.para: Speaker 1: Hello everybody and welcome to another episode of Leftist Lezzies. Speaker2 : No, we have to stop the recording. Speaker 1: What now? We just started. Speaker 3: Yes yes turn it off. Speaker 1: OK OK, we'll return. We'll be back.

history.justification: Needed a place to enter all "other" information valuable to the description of the resource.

changeLog.change: changed //cdm/required to //cdm/cdmRequired and //cdm/uwRequired to assist in halting use of the cdm "required" feature while, at the same time, indicating that UW-cdm collections must use, or not use, a given property; also changed @xsi:schemaLocation.
